      • generalMenu

        public static int generalMenu()

        generalMenu

        Description: prints the general menu and then registers the chosen option.

        Preconditions:

        • NONE: No preconditions.

        Postconditions:

        • The general menu is printed and the chosen option is returned.
        Returns:
        The option chosen from the menu.

        gueryMenu

        Postconditions:

        The option chosen from the menu.

      • registerCommunity

        public static void registerCommunity()

        registerCommunity

        Description: The method prints and registers all the necessary information to register a community. Since a community can face multiple challenges, every challenged will be entered as a yes or no question. It will print only one small menu:
        • To choose the CommunityType

        Preconditions:

        • controller: The controller must have been created.

        Postconditions:

        • A message stating if the community was successfully registered or not. If the community is not registered, the appropriate messages will be returned.

      • registerPlace

        public static void registerPlace()

        registerPlace

        Description:The method starts by checking if there is atleast one registered community (showing an error if there isn't), then it prints and registers all the necessary information to register a place. It will print 3 menus:
        • To select an existing community.
        • To select the Department.
        • To select the place type.

        Preconditions:

        • controller: The controller must have been created.

        Postconditions:

        • If there is not one registered community, an error message will be printed and the method will skip itself.
        • A message stating if the place was successfully registered or not. If the place was not registered, the appropiate messages will be returned.

      • addProduct

        public static void addProduct()

        addProduct

        Description:The method starts by checking if there is atleast one registered community (showing an error if there isn't), then it prints and registers all the necessary information to add a product to a community. It will print 2 menus:
        • To select an existing community.
        • To select the product type.

        Preconditions:

        • controller: The controller must have been created.

        Postconditions:

        • If there is not one registered community, an error message will be printed and the method will skip itself.
        • A message stating if the product was successfully registered or not. If the place was not registered, the appropiate messages will be returned.

      • deleteProduct

        public static void deleteProduct()

        deleteProduct

        Description: This method facilitates the deletion of a product from a community. It begins by verifying if at least one community is registered; if not, an error message is displayed and the method terminates. Then it checks if atleast one product is saved inside the community. If that the case, it throws an error and terminates the process. If communities exist, the user is prompted to select a community and then select the product to delete from two separate menus. It will print 2 menus:
        • To select an existing community.
        • To select the product from the selected community.

        Preconditions:

        • The controller parameter must represent the general controller of the application.

        Postconditions:

        • If there are no registered communities, an error message is displayed, and the method terminates without further action.
        • A message indicating whether the product was successfully deleted or not is printed.

      • addSpecies

        public static void addSpecies()

        addSpecies

        Description: This method starts by checking if there is at least one registered place. If there isn't, it displays an error message and the method is terminated. Otherwise, it prompts the user to select an existing place and enters the species information, including name, photo URL, local population, and species type, to add a new species to the selected place. It will print 2 menus:
        • To select an existing place.
        • To select the species type of the entered species.

        Preconditions:

        • controller must have been instantiated.

        Postconditions:

        • If there are no registered places, an error message is printed, and the method exits.
        • A message stating whether the species was successfully added or not is printed. If the species was not successfully added, appropriate error messages are displayed.

      • modifySpecies

        public static void modifySpecies()

        modifySpecies

        Description: Allows modification of species data by selecting an existing community and species, and then modifying the species information based on user input. The method ensures there is at least one registered place and one registered species to modify their information. If no place or species are registered, appropriate error messages are displayed. It will print 3 menus:
        • To select a place.
        • To select a species.
        • To select to select a species type (given if the user wants to change the speciesType)

        Preconditions:

        • controller must be initialized.

        Postconditions:

        • If there are no registered place or species, error messages will be printed.
        • If the species modification is successful, a message indicating success or failure will be printed.

      • accessPlace

        public static void accessPlace()

        accessPlace

        Description: Allows access to the information of a place by selecting an existing place and displaying its information. The diplaying information include all its attributes and relations. In the case of the caregiving community and the species it will only print their names. The method ensures there is at least one registered place. If no place is registered, an appropriate error message is displayed.

        Preconditions:

        • controller must be initialized.

        Postconditions:

        • If there are no registered places, an error message will be printed.
        • If the place selection is successful, the information of the selected place will be displayed.

      • accessDeptCommunity

        public static void accessDeptCommunity()

        accessDeptCommunity

        Description: Allows access to the information of a community by selecting an existing department and community, and displaying its information. The displayed information includes all attributes and relations of the selected community. The method ensures there is at least one registered place. If no place is registered, an appropriate error message is displayed. If the selected department does not have any communities, an error message is displayed. The additional checks are done by Controller.displayDeptCommunities(int).

        Preconditions:

        • controller must be initialized.

        Postconditions:

        • If there are no registered places, an error message will be printed.
        • If the selected department does not have any communities, an error message will be printed.
        • If the community selection is successful, the information of the selected community will be displayed.

      • accessHospSchooCommunities

        public static void accessHospSchooCommunities()

        accessHospSchooCommunities

        Description: Retrieves and displays information about communities facing challenges related to the absence of hospitals and lack of schools. It retrieves the information about such communities using the Controller.accessHospSchooCommunities() method. Then, it iterates through the array of community information and prints each entry.

        Preconditions:

        • Controller object must be initialized.

        Postconditions:

        • The information about communities facing the specified challenges is displayed.

      • mostDiverse

        public static void mostDiverse()

        mostDiverse

        Description: Displays information about the most diverse place. This method prints a message indicating that it will display information about the most diverse place. It checks if there is at least one registered place using the Controller.oneMinPlace() method. If there is at least one registered place, it retrieves information about the most diverse place using the Controller.mostDiverse() method and prints it. If there are no registered places, it prints a message indicating that no places are registered and prompts the user to enter a place.

        Preconditions:

        • The controller object must be initialized.

        Postconditions:

        • Information about the most diverse place is displayed .if at least one place is registered; otherwise, a message indicating no registered places is printed.
